justifications: US President Barack Obama speaks in Warsaw on July 8, 2016 (Photo: AFP/Mandel Ngan) \\\"No one has an interest in protracted, adversarial negotiations,\\\" Obama said after meeting European Council head Donald Tusk and European Commission chief Jean-Claude Juncker at a NATO summit dominated by Britain's post-EU future.

US President Barack Obama speaks in Warsaw on July 8, 2016 (Photo: AFP/Mandel Ngan) \\\"No one has an interest in protracted, adversarial negotiations,\\\" Obama said after meeting European Council head Donald Tusk and European Commission chief Jean-Claude Juncker at a NATO summit dominated by Britain's post-EU future.
